title: Cut Yourself Loose from Fools! (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Student loan forgiveness news,

Getting out of a messy house situation with family,

What to do with extra cash,

Buying a vacation home.


Support Our Sponsor:
Churchill Mortgage

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
